00029 /* Byte order.  */
00030 /* All compilers that support Mac OS X define either __BIG_ENDIAN__ or
00031 __LITTLE_ENDIAN__ to match the endianness of the architecture being
00032 compiled for. This is not necessarily the same as the architecture of the
00033 machine doing the building. In order to support Universal Binaries on
00034 Mac OS X, we prefer those defines to decide the endianness.
00035 On other platforms we use the result of the TRY_RUN. */
00036 #if !defined(__APPLE__)
00037 /* #undef OPJ_BIG_ENDIAN */
00038 #elif defined(__BIG_ENDIAN__)
00039 # define OPJ_BIG_ENDIAN
00040 #endif
